name: Adventures in Pastry Hell
description:
Adventures in Pastry Hell is a game about oasty the happy toast who's  pulled into pastry hell via pastry portal. Help Toasty make their escape and so they continue being happy!

Sound effects were found on freesound.org Music was found on Royalty Free site http://incompetech.com Artist Credit: "Pookatori and Friends" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
